handNote.p: This hand writes 2v and 12r–16v (formerly Luiselli Fadda homily VIII). It also revises the stint of DP1053 until fol. 6r in this item. Overwriting probably by Junius.
This hand (the manuscript's main hand) writes 3r–11v (Visio Pauli) and the ending on 17r/1–5. It seems to avoid the letter þ in this item. Overwriting probably by Junius.
